00029 using namespace Hypertable;

00031 const char *CommandShutdown::ms_usage[] = {
00032   "shutdown [now]",
00033   "",
00034   "  This command sends a shutdown request to the DfsBroker",
00035   "  server.  If the 'now' argument is given, the DfsBroker",
00036   "  will do an unclean shutdown by exiting immediately.  Otherwise",
00037   "  it will wait for all pending requests to complete before",
00038   "  shutting down.",
00039   (const char *)0
00040 };
00041 
00042 
00043 int CommandShutdown::run() {
00044   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00045   uint16_t flags = 0;
00046   EventPtr eventPtr;
00047 
00048   if (m_args.size() > 0) {
00049     if (m_args[0].first == "now")
00050       flags |= DfsBroker::Protocol::SHUTDOWN_FLAG_IMMEDIATE;
00051     else {
00052       Usage::dump(ms_usage);
00053       return -1;
00054     }
00055   }
00056 
00057   m_client->shutdown(flags, &syncHandler);
00058 
00059   syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr);
00060 
00061   return Error::OK;
00062 }
